m_gametext: ['*Prioritized quests can be accessed at any time from the Quest menu.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Master of Wealth', 'ボスシナリオテスト（イギリス）', '', 'ボスシナリオテスト（簡体字）', 'ボスシナリオテスト（繁体字）', 'ボスシナリオテスト（韓国）', 'ボスシナリオテスト（フランス）', 'ボスシナリオテスト（ドイツ）', 'ボスシナリオテスト（スペイン）', 'ボスシナリオテスト（ラテン）', 'ボスシナリオテスト（イタリア）', 'ボスシナリオテスト（オランダ）']

['The wealthiest person in all
the realm, Lady Herminia was
notorious to all as the "Covetous Witch."

Possessing wealth greater than
many nations, there is nothing in
this world her fortune cannot buy.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Meet up with Bargello outside Herminia's Manse.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Confront the man who killed the slaves.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['At a banquet thrown by Lady Herminia,
Bargello impressed the underworld
with his bravery.

Now, his new boss, Taviani,
has an order for him...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Meet up with Taviani at the Snowbloom Ruins.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["The siren call of wealth has corrupted
Sonia's once pure heart.

Furious at this turn of events,
Bargello hatches a plan to
overthrow Lady Herminia.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Search for the key to the locked door.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Backed by the might of his private army,
the Scarlet Wings, the so-called "hero"
Tytos rules Emberglow with an iron fist.

But there are those who would resist his
quest for greater and greater power...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Bereft of his beloved Rinyuu,
Velnorte has nothing left to lose.

And so he resolves to stop
Lord Tytos's vile scheme to
employ the scarlet elixir once and for all...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Deliver the accusation to the\nKnights Ardante in the Flatlands.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Go to the inn in Theatropolis in the Flatlands.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Velnorte was devastated as his beloved
Rinyuu was pushed off the peaks to her death.

Meanwhile, Lord Tytos was proceeding
with the final stages of his plan to secure
unprecedented power...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Aid the hunter in hunting down a snow yak.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Go to the house of the hunter Dmitri.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Go to the location where you heard the monster.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['In Theatropolis, center of the arts,
lived Auguste, the most famous
playwright in all the realm.

His works were praised and loved by all.
They even changed the hearts of his
most adoring fans...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Schwartz, his wife murdered
by Auguste, seeks revenge
against the mad playwright.

He visits Valore in hopes of finding
a means to kill his hated foe...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["In the name of writing a tragedy, Auguste
has tortured poor Francesca and her child.

And so Schwartz set out for the
amphitheatre to snuff out the
playwright's fame...and his life.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['So did the travelers defeat the three
greatest villains in the realm—
the masters of wealth, power, and fame.

Before them appeared a Knight Ardante
who wishes to talk to them about a certain ring.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Meet the ring maidens and seal away the rings.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Return to the altar on the Isle of Orsa.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["The travelers arrive in the Cliftlands
in pursuit of the rings' captor.

Here, in Edoras, the wedding of
Princess Elrica and General Mahrez
was about to take place...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Go to the Edoras Army's main encampment.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Power-hungry King Pardis III invades
neighboring nations with no regard for
the wishes of his subjects, his loyal men,
or even his daughter.

So it is that General Mahrez, the Lion of
Edoras, is sent to war against the Westerlings.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Framed for the assassination of
General Mahrez, the travelers have no
means to draw near the mad King Pardis.

Meanwhile, a proud swordsman sets off
on a journey to save a nation...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Keep the participants of the meeting safe.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Meeting the swordsman El and Charles,
a fellow traveler, the party arrives in the
desert town of Sunshade.

Here, they seek King Solon, in hopes of
preventing a heinous act to be committed
at a secret meeting...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['The meeting was a trap all along.
Edoras has annihilated Riven
and threatens to consolidate their power.

In the face of a powerful enemy, King Solon
and the swordsman El are forced to fight...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Deliver the written accusation to the Knights Ardante.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Head for the front gate of Castle Edoras.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['It is revealed that the mysterious swordsman
El was actually Princess Elrica of Edoras.

To save her from the clutches of King Pardis III,
Princess Alaune hatches a plot...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Vowing to carry on the mission of her
ill-fated sister, Elrica, Princess Alaune
resolves to stand against the mad King Pardis.

She vows to fight together with the
travelers, and indeed, has been preparing
to do so for some time...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Together with Prince Richard, Princess Alaune
and the travelers defeat the jester Gonska, who
had taken control of the Kingdom of Riven.

As she faced the decisive battle alongside
King Solon, a single arrow struck her...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Head for the altar on the Isle of Orsa.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['With the fall of the mad King Pardis,
master of all, Orsterra has at last
found a measure of peace.

Having collected all four rings,
the travelers now find themselves
standing before a mysterious figure...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["The four rings were sealed
away on the Isle of Orsa.

And yet, the travelers' respite was
short-lived, as they now find themselves
setting forth on a new adventure....", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["By ending Lady Herminia's reign of terror,
Bargello and his friends have brought a
measure of peace to Valore.

And yet, after overcoming the deaths
of their friends, the hand of evil creeps up
on their loyal band...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['The wealthy Delcado, whom
Bargello was supposed to meet
at a feast, has been murdered.

In a message writ in blood,
the killer identified themself
only as "the Have-not."', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Go to the location identified on the map.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Tiziano lives, known now
as Oskha the Have-not.

The gravely injured Bargello
has yet to open his eyes.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['With the death of King Pardis III, the realm
of Orsterra has found peace once more.

In the hopes of making this state of harmony
and order permanent, the kings were on the
verge of signing a peace treaty...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["An emissary from G'roha, a powerful empire
to the west, has declared war on the entire
continent of Orsterra.

Alaune and the other leaders of nations now
rally their troops to prepare to fight for their
realm.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Riven's neighbor, Donescu, is overtaken
by Tatloch.

Alaune flees in hopes of protecting the ring
and ponders a way to strike back...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Speak with the Knight Ardante and board the boat.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Go to the location identified on the map.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Much time has passed since the day the
scarlet snow fell, and peaceful times have
returned to Emberglow.

But alas, the pure white snow is once again
to be stained with blood...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Deliver the investigation results to Pontiff Julius.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Gather information from those connected with\nthe church.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['The individual known as Black Scarlet
has been assassinating church officials
one after another.

The travelers join together with
Flameguard Sazantos to determine
who is behind this dark plot.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Obtain important evidence from the\nScarlet Wing soldier.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Report to Rondo of the Knights Ardante.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['The scholar Sofia has come to the
Frostlands in search of rare flora.
Fascination with this fieldwork
appears to have rendered her
completely oblivious to her
current circumstances.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Take Sofia to a tavern to warm up.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Sofia was so engrossed in her
fieldwork that a ferocious monster
caught her unawares. Now,
however, her interest has turned to
the strange moss that grows on
the cave creatures.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Return to town and study the moss.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Sofia successfully cultivated moss
taken from a mossy cave tortoise.
Now she has set out in pursuit of
her dream—to a frozen precipice
where certain death awaits.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['At the frozen precipice, Sofia finds
the legendary flowers she sought
stolen by a mysterious man,
roots and all. She returns to town
in search of answers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['See if there are any suspicious characters in town.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Return the withered flower to its original habitat.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Fiore, a short-fused member of
the Rippletide Watch, has taken
rookie member Mika out on
patrol of the coast.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Fiore was upset when she
found out that Mika had been
keeping her skills a secret.
However, after recalling her
late father she wishes to
apologize to Mika.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Fiore made it just in time to
rescue Mika, who had strayed
from her patrol. While the pair's
relationship grows stronger,
an ominous presence draws
ever closer...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Accompany Fiore as she quits the watch.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Fiore is trying to protect Mika
from the underground arena
champion, a vicious man known
as Guido the Killer. What could
await her...?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A string of killings perpetuated
by a large ratkin have taken
place in Shepherds Rock. The
skilled hunter Scarecrow has
been hired to deal with the ratkin.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Scarecrow misses his chance to take
down the large ratkin. There seems
to be some connection between him
and his target...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['The merchant manipulating the
large ratkin via the scented sachet
has taken his own life. What was he
so desperate to protect?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Find clues in the hut used by the merchant.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["It turns out that the unsavory
apothecary was an enemy from
Scarecrow's past. Hoping to settle
things, Scarecrow sets off in pursuit.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Gilderoy, a jeweler with no short\nsupply of confidence, has found\nhimself in trouble after a deal goes wrong.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Gilderoy was set up by a group of
jewel thieves called the Blue Jade.
He wants to find some kind of lead
on the group.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Gilderoy learns the location
of the thieves' hideout from
one of their members, and
intends to get the jewel back.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["The Blue Jade's mastermind is the
same Lord Ronan whose jewel was stolen.
Gilderoy decides to meet with him to
determine the truth.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Find out the truth from Lord Ronan.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Millard, a cleric, is passing through
Valore on a pilgrimage. He enters
the town with excited anticipation,
but what encounters await him here?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Millard managed to bring the elderly
Father Marlowe safely back to town
to rest his back. Now, it seems, he
wants to help more people who need it.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Meet with the mayor as\nFather Marlowe recommends.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Rescue the hunter Sam from a monster attack.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Escort the wounded hunter Sam back to town.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Millard rescued Sam, the hunter,
from the monsters that attacked him.
But now Sam is planning to go
hunting again before his wounds
are even healed.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Give the medicinal herbs to Sam, the hunter.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Consider Father Marlowe's words in the church.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Which is the best path to helping
others—wealth, or power?
Confronted with this question
by Father Marlowe, Millard found
himself unable to answer.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['The Serpentes are a gang of bandits
that torment the merchants of Sunshade.
The thief Viola has taken up the
challenge of putting a stop to them.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Get the jewels back from the Serpentes.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Deliver the recovered jewels to the merchant.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['While the Serpentes continue to
wreak havoc, the merchants are
seeking ways to eradicate them.
Viola fully intends to get in on the action.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Despite sustaining great losses when\ntheir nest was attacked, the Serpentes\ncontinue their operations.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Viola has turned the tables on the
assassins of Strahd, leader of the Serpentes.
She heads for his estate now, hoping
to exact her revenge.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Take back what was stolen by Strahd.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Apothecary Theo has come to
Theatropolis after hearing that
counterfeit curatives said to be
made by the great Pollonia are
on the market there. It seems that
he means to confiscate the lot.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Theo is combing the town for
counterfeit curatives falsely
attributed to his grandmother.
However, it seems that there are
still more counterfeits to root out.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Talk to the apothecary selling pills with Pollonia's seal.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Theo's grandmother's curatives
weren't the only thing being
counterfeited. Fraudulent recipes
were also doing the rounds.
The damage done to the Pollonia
name is worsening by the day.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A dangerous medicine called
"faerie dust" is circulating with
the Pollonia seal on it. Theo is
determined to get to the bottom
of this fraud.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Lynette is a dancer in pursuit of her
dream to one day have her very
own troupe. She seems to be looking
for someone in Cragspear.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Search for Faust, impresario of\nthe Dawnsong Players.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["After dancing for Faust, the impresario
of the Dawnsong Players, Lynette is
accepted into the troupe. Not long
after, Faust's assistant Joel brings
news regarding her very first job.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Promote the upcoming performance of\nthe Dawnsong Players.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Faust has asked Lynette to meet\nwith him in private. He seems to\nknow something about her mother, Mona.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Lynette has successfully driven
back Faust, but is listless as she
realizes her dream has disappeared
right before her eyes.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Ask the old man about Lynette's mother.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Wingate has always admired
the figure of the noble thief.
Now he is looking for a partner
for his next big job.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Surprise the wicked apothecary in his home.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Take the stolen medicine to the tavern.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Noble Thievery for a Noble Thief's Sake", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Wingate scared the monopolist
apothecary straight and saved
the ill child. But now this noble thief
has his eye on another wicked citizen.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Take the stolen money and visit the apothecary.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Wingate confesses that he became
a noble thief to follow in the footsteps
of his uncle, Zenil the Zip-handed.
Now, it seems, Zenil is confined to
bed due to an old wound.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['After entrusting his treasure map
to Wingate, Zenil the Zip-handed
breathed his last. Devastated and
desolate, Wingate needs a reminder
of what truly matters.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Go to the spot marked on Zenil's map.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Return to town and think about\nwhat the letter meant.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Drunk in the corner of the
tavern is a man named
Cless. Despite how inebriated
he may be, he continues to
request more alcohol. It seems
he wants nothing to do with
anyone...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Report to the proprietress of the tavern.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Cless is attacked by thugs.
It seems there are secrets in
his past—ones that reverberate
alongside the noble thief
Nasturtium's name in this
snowy town.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Cless has survived the attack
and reveals that he was once
the noble thief Nasturtium. He
seems to have some interest
in a painting called "Kerrin's Gasp."', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Go to the storehouse where Kerrin's Gasp\nis on display.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Cless attempts to steal Kerrin's Gasp,\nbut is ambushed by Aristolo. Cless\nchallenges him in order to settle the past.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["A townsperson was swindled by
an unscrupulous merchant,
and Kurtz has accepted his
request to get it back. He
is now trying to find a way
to sneak into the merchant's
home.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Steal the necklace back from the merchant.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Kurtz is raising funds to form a
band of noble thieves. He's decided
to target immoral aristocrats who
have made their roosts in town.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Kurtz saves a child from a guard
while on the way to the noble's
manor. He seems worried about
the child's unusual circumstances...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['A man named Geltner is gathering
children and forcing them to steal
on his behalf. Kurtz readily accepts
the request for help from the
young thief Geoff as he was once
a victim of men just like Geltner.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Devin appraises the forest's trees
with a loving eye. One day,
happenstance draws him into
a disagreement over lumber.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Find where the argument is taking place.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Devin saw through Jude, the merchant's,
attempt to swindle the forester Johann,
winning Johann's respect in the process.
But it seems that Johann has other
problems as well.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Ask the varnish merchant for the details.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Devin found a solution to forest
curator Johann's immediate problems.
But Johann will soon be in greater
peril than ever.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Make a deal with the hunter from Valore.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Devin found a way to rid Johann's\nforest of the dangerous beast.\nBut Jude's iniquity knows no bounds...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Stop Jude from doing any more damage.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Heinz is a sociologist studying the
disparity between rich and poor.
He is just about to launch an
investigation into the impoverished
people of Cragspear.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Heinz gets entangled with a ruffian,
bringing his investigation to an abrupt
end. Undeterred, Heinz heads for the
slums once more.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Heinz's uncle Ryan is unsympathetic
towards his goals, asserting his research
is nothing but a hobby. Nevertheless,
Heinz presses onward until bad
news reaches him...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Heinz defeats his uncle and avenges\nhis dear friend Jim. With determination\nin his heart, Heinz heads to Jim's grave.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Peredir is an elderly scholar who
travels the land in search of ruins.
Unfortunately, the person he's
waiting on has yet to arrive...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Get the stone tablet back from Morbidus.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Peredir has gotten the ancient tablet
back from his archenemy Morbidus.
Now he is using it as a clue to help
him identify the location of the
Gasche Ruins he seeks.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Identify the location of the Gasche Ruins.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['After staving off Morbidus, Peredir
continues his search for the ruins.
Based on the information gathered from
locals, the Gasche Ruins are likely to
be in the depths of the woods.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Peredir defeats Morbidus, who was
revealed to be a follower of the dark god,
then continues his investigation.
The location of the Gasche Ruins has yet
to reveal itself...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['The scholar Laura is looking for a
merchant in Theatropolis. She wants
to buy a book for the entrance exam
to join the Archaeological Society.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Find the merchant selling "The Birth of the\nKingdom of Wold."', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Though Laura's father advises her
to give up her career as a scholar,
she refuses to let go of her dream.
Soon after, she is paid a visit by
an old acquaintance.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Find the reference materials needed to write\nthe appraisal.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Laura has finished appraising the
vase fragment requested by Scott.
She is studying hard for her admission
to the Archaeological Society, but
suddenly...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["After bringing her former fiancé's
misdeeds to light, Laura is finally
accepted by her father. Now, all
she has left to face is the entrance exam
to join the Archaeological Society.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['The hunter Ashlan possesses the power to
sense beasts. He is headed for the mountain
pass so he can stop the beast that has been
attacking merchants.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Ashlan is suspicious after he sensed something
like never before from the beast slain on the
mountain pass. The client who requested the
job has a new task for Ashlan.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Stop the beast that's been attacking people.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Bring the carcass to Gavin the scholar.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Ashlan suffers from a strange sort of mental
fatigue after the beast on the road is slain. It
seems that Gavin, the scholar that requested
the job, has something to tell Ashlan...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Vidal has been using crimson devilbloom to
send beasts into a rampage. Though Ashlan
failed to capture Vidal, he is more confused by
the slew of negative emotions that bubbled up
within him moments before.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Follow the beast's trail and search for Vidal.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Trish is a warrior who earns a living serving
as a bodyguard and monster slayer. She is
searching for something in the port town of
Rippletide.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Help the fisherman being taken by pirates.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['In truth, Trish wants to become a chef,\nwhich is why she is in pursuit of the\nso-called "rare crab."', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Trish treats the fishermen hurt by the pirates\nto a delicious meal. It seems they're happy\nto help her locate the rare crab now.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Check if the fishing boat has returned.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Trish has repelled the pirates, and\nnow she has more information\non the rare crab.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Treat the townspeople to the rare crab.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Tahir is a warrior who greatly admires
his grandfather, the Crimson Blade.
His journey comes to a pause in
Sunshade, where he rescues a girl
being abducted.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Tahir has rescued Silke from the hands of\nBaron Edmonds. He's now received a request\nfrom Silke's father Hannes.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["At the request of Silke's father Hannes,
Tahir has seen to the issue with the
lizardmen. Suddenly, Baron Edmonds
has appeared before Tahir once more.
The baron seems to have known
Tahir's grandfather.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Head to the duel with the baron's champion.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Head to the duel with the baron's champion.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["Baron Edmonds escapes the duel,
cursing Tahir's grandfather all the while.
Hoping to settle things and clear
his grandfather's name, Tahir resolves to
finish the duel.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Sigrid was once a disciple of a famous
blademaster, and is now on a journey to
master the blade. She has returned to the
Highlands in order to further her training.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['Sigrid reveals she has continued her journey
of training to avenge her master. She is now
headed to the mountain pass to deliver
supplies to a group of mercenaries since
fiends have recently made their home there.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Take Shepherds Rock Pass back to town.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

["While delivering supplies, Sigrid has an
unexpected reunion with a fellow
disciple of the blademaster named Hogni.
When the sound of a bell reaches
her ears, she recalls her master's words.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
